topic.name: Pharmacology
topic.description: Drug classifications, mechanisms, and safe administration.

questions.text: Which insulin has the fastest onset?
questions.explanation: Lispro is a rapid-acting insulin analogue with onset under 15 minutes.

questions.text: Naloxone is the antidote for toxicity caused by which drug class?
questions.explanation: Naloxone rapidly displaces opioids from receptors to reverse respiratory depression.

questions.text: Which pregnancy category represents the safest drugs for use in pregnancy?
questions.explanation: Category A drugs show controlled studies with no risk to the fetus.
